org.bson.codecs

类 ValueCodecProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bson.codecs.ValueCodecProvider
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CodecProvider

    public class ValueCodecProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements CodecProvider
    A Codec provider for dynamically-typed value classes. Other providers are needed for containers for maps and arrays. It provides the following codecs:
    • BinaryCodec
    • BooleanCodec
    • DateCodec
    • DoubleCodec
    • IntegerCodec
    • LongCodec
    • Decimal128Codec
    • MinKeyCodec
    • MaxKeyCodec
    • CodeCodec
    • ObjectIdCodec
    • CharacterCodec
    • StringCodec
    • SymbolCodec
    • UuidCodec
    • ByteCodec
    • ShortCodec
    • ByteArrayCodec
    • FloatCodec
    • AtomicBooleanCodec
    • AtomicIntegerCodec
    • AtomicLongCodec
    从以下版本开始:
    3.0

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ValueCodecProvider()
      A provider of Codecs for simple value types.

    • 方法详细资料

      • get

        public <T> Codec<T> get(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                        CodecRegistry registry)
        从接口复制的说明: CodecProvider
        Get a Codec using the given context, which includes, most importantly, the Class for which a Codec is required.
        指定者:
        get 在接口中 CodecProvider
        类型参数:
        T - the type of the class for which a Codec is required
        参数:
        clazz - the Class for which to get a Codec
        registry - the registry to use for resolving dependent Codec instances
        返回:
        the Codec instance, which may be null, if this source is unable to provide one for the requested Class

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
